author: News On February
title: Cash me ousside girl Danielle Peskowitz Bregoli in Lake Worth, Kavasutra kava bar fight - Yahoo7
text:
Share Cash me ousside girl Danielle Peskowitz Bregoli in Lake Worth, Kavasutra kava bar fight - Yahoo7 A teenager who became the centre of an internet firestorm and global media coverage after an incendiary talk show appearance has been thrown back into the spotlight. Close 'Cash me ousside' girl filmed in late night altercation UP NEXT VIDEO 'Cash me ousside' girl filmed in late night altercation. Source: New York Post 'Cash me ousside' girl filmed in late night altercation 
Leaked security camera footage has emerged of 13-year-old Danielle Peskowitz Bregoli and two friends in Lake Worth, Florida, in a confrontation with an adult woman outside a bar 
The girl, who became infamous online in the “Cash me ousside” meme that lampoons her appearance on Dr Phil, now features in a security camera video in which one of her companions throws an ice cream at a bar patron. The footage purports to show on of the trio throwing an ice cream at a woman who asked why they were out so late. Photo: YouTube/Kavasutra Kavabar 
Footage posted to YouTube and social media appears to show Bregoli and two friends approaching women at Lake Worth’s Kavasutra Kava Bar. 
The incident saw tabloid NY Daily News declare the child a "bi coastal menace". The Palm Beach Sheriff's Office is now investigating the incident. 
According to the YouTube post, Bregoli was asked why she was out so late before the incident. Danielle Peskowitz Bregoli explains plane fight 
The footage shows a security guard intervening after the item is thrown as the three children retreat from the angry adults. 
Bregoli became the subject of ongoing online jibes and increasing media coverage after her appearance alongside her mother on Dr Phil on September 16. The three children retreat as a security guard steps in to restrain the angry adults. Photo: YouTube/Kavasutra Kavabar 
One of a long line of troubled teens to appear on the show, Bregoli was singled out for attention when she attempted to confront an audience member. 
“Cash me ousside, how bow dah” memes and image macros have continued to appear on the internet ever since, parodying the teenager’s speaking style. Danielle Peskowitz Bregoli has been the subject of intense scrutiny since her September 2016 appearance on Dr Phil. Photo: Supplied 
The line mimics her apparent threat to the audience member to “Catch her outside”. 
Bregoli has since acquired more attention after an altercation on a plane and a controversy around an alleged boyfriend several years her senior.
